definitions.body: father of Teraḥ Ge 11:22, Ge 11:23, Ge 11:24, Ge 11:25 (all P), 1Ch 1:26.

son of Teraḥ and brother of Abr. Ge 11:26, Ge 11:27 (P), v:Ge 11:29, v:Ge 11:29, Ge 22:20, Ge 22:23, Ge 24:15, Ge 24:24, Ge 24:47 cf. Ge 29:5 (all J), Jos 24:2 (E); ´[[עִיר נ]] Ge 24:10 (J); ´[[אֶלֽהֵי נ]] Ge 31:53 (E).—LXX always Naxwr.
